page.title: 20A DAY IN THE LIFE..(SEAMILL)
page.content: I{wake up}at 7.30a.m. most mornings (with a bit of help), get washed, brush my teeth and then go for breakfast. After this I pack my bag, get my coat on and go out to wait for the taxi to take me to{school. }Most often we start with a short discussion of any interesting items of news and then we get down to work. In the morning this consists of{Maths}and {English. }Sometimes we go to television if the programme has something to do with our class work. In the afternoons we might do{History, {Social Studies, Science, Geography or {Physical Education. }If the weather is nice, we go outside for P.E. School finishes for the day at 3.35p.m. If it isn't raining, I might go out to play till teatime. If it is, I'll sit and watch television for a while, do my homework and then go to{bed.
